cotton.basal: Apply 50 kg Nitrogen, 25 kg Phosphorus, 25 kg Potash per hectare at sowing
cotton.top_dressing: Apply remaining Nitrogen in two splits at 30 and 60 DAS
cotton.micronutrients: Apply Zinc Sulphate 25 kg/ha once in 2–3 years

soybean.basal: Apply 30 kg Nitrogen, 60 kg Phosphorus, 40 kg Potash per hectare
soybean.top_dressing: Not required due to nitrogen fixation

rice.basal: Apply 60 kg Nitrogen, 30 kg Phosphorus, 30 kg Potash per hectare
rice.top_dressing: Apply Nitrogen in 3 splits: transplanting, tillering, panicle initiation
rice.micronutrients: Apply Zinc Sulphate 25 kg/ha if deficiency appears

wheat.basal: Apply 60 kg Nitrogen, 40 kg Phosphorus, 40 kg Potash per hectare
wheat.top_dressing: Apply remaining Nitrogen at first irrigation (20–25 DAS)
wheat.micronutrients: Apply Zinc Sulphate if deficiency occurs

maize.basal: Apply 60 kg Nitrogen, 40 kg Phosphorus, 40 kg Potash per hectare
maize.top_dressing: Apply Nitrogen in two splits at knee-high and tasseling stage

sugarcane.basal: Apply 75 kg Nitrogen, 60 kg Phosphorus, 60 kg Potash per hectare
sugarcane.top_dressing: Apply remaining Nitrogen in 2–3 splits up to 120 days
sugarcane.micronutrients: Apply Ferrous Sulphate if iron deficiency is observed

tomato.basal: Apply 60 kg Nitrogen, 50 kg Phosphorus, 50 kg Potash per hectare
tomato.top_dressing: Apply Nitrogen and Potash in 3–4 splits during flowering and fruiting
tomato.micronutrients: Apply Calcium and Boron for better fruit quality

potato.basal: Apply 75 kg Nitrogen, 50 kg Phosphorus, 50 kg Potash per hectare
potato.top_dressing: Apply remaining Nitrogen at earthing-up stage
potato.micronutrients: Apply Magnesium if deficiency is seen

banana.basal: Apply 200 g Nitrogen, 60 g Phosphorus, 200 g Potash per plant
banana.top_dressing: Apply fertilizers in monthly splits up to 8 months
banana.micronutrients: Apply Zinc and Boron sprays at vegetative stage

onion.basal: Apply 50 kg Nitrogen, 40 kg Phosphorus, 40 kg Potash per hectare
onion.top_dressing: Apply Nitrogen in two splits at 30 and 45 DAS
onion.micronutrients: Apply Sulphur for better bulb development

groundnut.basal: Apply 20 kg Nitrogen, 40 kg Phosphorus, 40 kg Potash per hectare
groundnut.micronutrients: Apply Gypsum 500 kg/ha at flowering stage

tur.basal: Apply 25 kg Nitrogen, 50 kg Phosphorus, 25 kg Potash per hectare
tur.top_dressing: Apply Nitrogen at 30 DAS if crop growth is poor
tur.micronutrients: Apply Zinc and Boron if deficiency occurs

grapes.top_dressing: Apply NPK as per growth stage (vegetative, flowering, berry development)
grapes.micronutrients: Apply Magnesium, Zinc, and Boron sprays

mango.basal: Apply FYM 20–25 kg per tree before monsoon
mango.top_dressing: Apply NPK after flowering and fruit set
mango.micronutrients: Apply Boron and Zinc sprays for fruit quality
